Indian Economy.title: Falling crude prices, surplus services exports to keep India's CAD in comfort zone: Crisil
Indian Economy.summary: The report stated that India's CAD is expected to remain in the comfort zone at an average of 1% of GDP in fiscal 2026, compared with 0.6% of GDP in fiscal 2025
